OVERLOADED - Allocated data that should be cleaned up.

Reimplemented in CMyEngine.

int CEngine::GetFPS (   ) 
 

Get the current FPS.

Returns:
The number of drawn frames in the last second.
Remarks:
The FPS is only updated once each second.

SDL_Surface * CEngine::GetSurface (   ) 
 

Retrieve the main screen surface.

Returns:
A pointer to the SDL_Surface surface
Remarks:
The surface is not validated internally.

const char * CEngine::GetTitle (   ) 
 

Retrieve the title of the application window.

Returns:
The last set windows title as a character array.
Remarks:
Only the last set title is returned. If another application has changed the window title, then that title won't be returned.

void CEngine::HandleInput (   )  [protected]
 

Handles all controller inputs.

Remarks:
This function is called once per frame.

void CEngine::Init (   ) 
 

Initialize SDL, the window and the additional data.

virtual void CEngine::MouseButtonDown (  const int &  iButton,
const int &  iX,
const int &  iY,
const int &  iRelX,
const int &  iRelY
)  [inline, virtual]
 

OVERLOADED - A mouse button has been pressed.

Parameters:
iButton Specifies if a mouse button is pressed.
iX The mouse position on the X-axis in pixels.
iY The mouse position on the Y-axis in pixels.
iRelX The mouse position on the X-axis relative to the last position, in pixels.
iRelY The mouse position on the Y-axis relative to the last position, in pixels.

Reimplemented in CMyEngine.

virtual void CEngine::MouseMoved (  const int &  iButton,
const int &  iX,
const int &  iY,
const int &  iRelX,
const int &  iRelY
)  [inline, virtual]
 

OVERLOADED - The mouse has been moved.

Parameters:
iButton Specifies if a mouse button is pressed.
iX The mouse position on the X-axis in pixels.
iY The mouse position on the Y-axis in pixels.
iRelX The mouse position on the X-axis relative to the last position, in pixels.
iRelY The mouse position on the Y-axis relative to the last position, in pixels.
Bug:
The iButton variable is always NULL.

Reimplemented in CMyEngine.
